questions.questionText: What is the name of the method in which the program begins execution?
questions.explanation: The main method is where the JVM looks for when starting a program

questions.questionText: How can you compare the content of two Strings?
questions.explanation: You must use the .equals method to compare string objects.

questions.questionText: What is the logo for Java?
questions.explanation: This has been the logo for Java since 2003

questions.questionText: What keyword is used to declare a variable whose value cannot be changed?
questions.explanation: FINAL is the keyword used to identify a constant in Java

questions.questionText: Which data type defines a whole number?
questions.explanation: int is used to define numbers like 1, 2, 3, etc.

questions.questionText: What is the term for a function that calls itself?
questions.explanation: Recursion is when a function calls upon itself within its body

questions.questionText: Which one of these languages allows for styling of a website?
questions.explanation: CSS is used to style websites for many applications.
HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language

questions.questionText: Which one of these languages primarily creates websites for front-end applications?
questions.explanation: JavaScript is primarily used for front-end applications.
